Namespace MagicQuizDesktop.Repositories

Classes

QuestionRepository

Represents a repository for managing questions in a quiz. This class performs API calls for CRUD operations on the question data.

RankRepository

This class performs API calls for CRUD operations on the question data. The class for repository that handles operations related to ranking in a quiz application. Implements the IRankRepository.

TopicRepository

The TopicRepository class provides methods for interacting with Topics in a quiz application. It uses REST API requests to get, add, update, and delete topics.

UserRepository

UserRepository class that implements IUserRepository. This class utilizes a QuizApiService and provides methods for authenticating, getting user(s), updating user, inactivating user and logging out.
